bug.author: kymillev
bug.summary: Passing save-txt flag changes validation results
bug.description:
I am running the latest version as of today (08/17/2020). <denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
When running python test.py on a custom dataset the results with and without the save-txt flag are different. <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Without save-txt: <denchmark-code>!python test.py --weights best_run7.pt --data routeyou.yaml --img 1024
Class Images Targets P R mAP@.5 all 128 71 0.934 0.958 0.99 0.909 </denchmark-code>
With save-txt: <denchmark-code>!python test.py --weights best_run7.pt --data routeyou.yaml --img 1024 --save-txt
Class Images Targets P R mAP@.5 all 128 71 0.907 0.93 0.958 0.569 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
The validation results should be the same (except for the last one regarding the speed)
